title: So how long till Cho is nerfed?
body:
I mean now that LPL and LCS are picking him ppl will eventually jump on the wagon and once ppl realize how well he does vs LCSbigplay assassins (especially Zed) he's definitely losing his silence.

RIP my sweet prince.

replies.body: We're still waiting for Annie's nerf. She's picked way more often and even when 0/20, can still nearly 100-0 a squishy while CC'ing an entire enemy team. :P
